Assignments.name: Assignment 1
Assignments.title: Design Course Dashboard
Assignments.description: Each student must design a home page in their Venus account, or another webaccessible server of their choosing, to serve as their course “dashboard”. This will be used by the instructor to access and evaluate the student’s programming assignments. Essentially, one should have a link to each class assignment, starting with our “Zybook”, and gradually addingother assignments as they are implemented. The site should consider the guidelines and best practices set forth in our lecture on “web design”, and in particular utilize “responsive web design” (RWD).

Assignments.name: Assignment 2
Assignments.title: URL Analyzer
Assignments.description: The goal of this assignment is to obtain and analyze a set of URLs. Provide a File-Upload button so that the user/instructor can choose a file which will contain a list of URLs. Parse the URLs into their component parts and obtain the IP address. Use bar graphs or pie charts to present your analysis

Assignments.name: Assignment 3
Assignments.title: IP Address Manager
Assignments.description: The goal of this assignment is to provide an interface for assigning and managing IP addresses for the various models of IP addressing. There are several prices of information that will need to be entered by the user: IPv4/IPv6, classful or classless, choice of class A-E for classful addressing, choice of zero-compression for IPv6, # of hosts/addresses
